data.overview: NYPD cop, John McClane's plan to reconcile with his estranged wife is thrown for a serious loop when minutes after he arrives at her office, the entire building is overtaken by a group of terrorists. With little help from the LAPD, wisecracking McClane sets out to single-handedly rescue the hostages and bring the bad guys down.
data.title: Die Hard
data.keywords: helicopter,journalist,based on novel,terrorist,skyscraper,christmas party,s.w.a.t.,hostage,kidnapping,vault,fistfight,murder,heist,shootout,los angeles,one man army,explosion,violence,fbi agent,walkie talkie,christmas eve,elevator shaft,one night,action hero,
